Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class ImagePaddleView

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.PaddleView
project.chenlin_17.Views.ImagePaddleView
public class ImagePaddleView extends PaddleView
This image ball class is the concrete class extends from the ball class.
It creates the ball with set image. Note: It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.
Version:
Version2.0
update: Jan 3rd
Author:
Lin CHEN

    • ImagePaddleView

      public ImagePaddleView(PaddleModel model, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle container, javafx.scene.image.Image image, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This constructor creates the regular paddle type, whose viewing is expected to be a rectangle with an image attaches to it.
      Parameters:
      model - paddle model
      container - defined paddle movement range
      image - expected paddle image
      group - expected viewing group
